EmailTemplate.description: Email template when Case status is done for three days and Case quote is greater than 5000
EmailTemplate.name: CaseQuoteGreaterThan5000_EmailTemplate
EmailTemplate.subject: Follow Up on Quote Number {!Case.Quote_Number__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for requesting a quote from Honeywell Aerospace. To easily place your order for what was quoted or for any other products, please go to myaerospace.honeywell.com.
If you have already placed your order, please disregard this message.
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Team {!Case.CaseNumber}{!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
